SELECT
FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE r.id = #{id} for update

SELECT
FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r Inner join ROCKY_BORROW b on b.id = r.BORROW_ID WHERE r.BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} ORDER BY r.ID ASC

SELECT b.ID, b.STATUS, b.NAME, b.BORROWTYPE, b.USER_ID, b.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT, b.APR, b.STYLE, b.VALID_TIME, b.ADDTIME, r.id AS repamentId, r.`STATUS` AS repamentStatus, r.WEBSTATUS AS repamentWebStatus FROM rocky_borrow b LEFT JOIN rocky_b_repaymentrecord r ON b.ID = r.borrow_id LEFT JOIN rocky_borrow_approved a ON b.ID = a.BORROW_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.`STATUS` = 4 AND b.`STATUS` IN (4,5,42) AND b.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT count(1) FROM rocky_borrow b LEFT JOIN rocky_b_repaymentrecord r ON b.ID = r.borrow_id LEFT JOIN rocky_borrow_approved a ON b.ID = a.BORROW_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.`STATUS` = 4 AND b.`STATUS` IN (4,5,42) and b.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME) as REPAYMENT_TIME_2, rb.name name, rb.time_limit time_Limit, rb.apr apr, rb.id borrowId, rb.style style, RB.credit_rating AS creditRating, RB.BORROWTYPE ,
FROM ROCKY_B_REPAYMENTRECORD r, ROCKY_BORROW RB WHERE r.BORROW_ID = RB.ID
AND RB.NAME LIKE CONCAT(#{borrowName}, '%' )
ORDER BY
r.order desc,
r.order asc,
r.status asc,r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME desc , r.REPAYMENT_TIME asc

SELECT count(1) FROM ROCKY_B_REPAYMENTRECORD r, ROCKY_BORROW RB WHERE r.BORROW_ID = RB.ID
